summary: THE POWER STEERING FLUID LEAKED OUT OF THE VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER DISCOVERED THAT THERE AN INVESTIGATION GOING ON BUT NO RECALLS YET.    *NLM  THE POWER STEERING FLUID LEAKED OUT OF THE VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER DISCOVERED THAT THERE AN INVESTIGATION GOING ON BUT NO RECALLS YET. CAUSE: POWER STEERING HOSE CLAMP FELL OFF WHILE DRIVING.  SOLUTION: NEW HOSE CLAMP INSTALLED AND SYSTEM HAD TO BE BLED AND FLUSHED. *MR
